about_the_game:
Sinsonasty Mangles team
The Mangles stunned the MFL last season as the hottest Cinderella team in the league. They made it to the Mayhem Bowl and lost in a nail-biter. With the MVP-level pairing of QB Bro Shiesty and speedy WR Bizarre Ace. No team enjoys a deeper, more explosive pass-catching group than the Mangles. Now throw in a strong run game, plus a stingy and hard-hitting defense, and the Mangles have the firepower to contend with any team in the league.
​​
Concrete Jungle Stadium
Play against or as the Mangles in Concrete Jungle Stadium which is filled with more dangerous hazards than Sinsonasty’s worst neighborhoods. Moving spikes, firepits, and mutant traps litter this urban jungle field.

Theme Song
No Place to Hide
Written by: John Hedges Ross
Courtesy of APM Music

This content requires the base game Mutant Football League in order to play.

content_descriptors.notes: Mutant Football League features violence, blood and gore (including exploding body parts, comically horrific deaths, and blood splatters) and some strong language.

The Mangles stunned the MFL last season as the hottest Cinderella team in the league. They made it to the Mayhem Bowl and lost in a nail-biter. With the MVP-level pairing of QB Bro Shiesty and speedy WR Bizarre Ace. No team enjoys a deeper, more explosive pass-catching group than the Mangles. Now throw in a strong run game, plus a stingy and hard-hitting defense, and the Mangles have the firepower to contend with any team in the league.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core2Quad 2.67 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
